name: Vtuber Slime Dungeon
description:
What happens when put a bunch of indie vtubers in a slime dungeon? It's up to you to guide and lead a group of magically infused vtubers through a small dungeon filled with slimes of unknow origin.

This is the very first game I ever made, it's more of a learning project than a full game, I'm proud of it nevertheless.  This is also a love letter for all the people featured in the game as they all are vtubers I've come to know over my time on youtube.

EdgeFurry

  • Me
  • Kitten
  • Scalak
  • Sozhen

Babajiji

  • Houya
  • Pao
  • Pia

 Let me know what you liked about it, what you don't like about it, what's lacking, I'm eager to learn more and this is far from my last game. Enjoy!
